Description:
FANTASTIC BUYING IN THE HEART OF WOMBAH PARK
Impressive in size this quality built Dennehy single level family home offers the ultimate in low maintenance living and situated in the heart of Wombah Park. Presenting a perfect opportunity for the first home buyer, retirees or those looking to secure an excellent investment property.
Freshly painted throughout and comprising 3 bedrooms inclusive of built in robes, two-way spacious bathroom, laundry, light filled open plan kitchen / meals and generous sized living area with a northerly aspect and outlook to a private undercover courtyard, front yard and garden. Featuring reverse cycle air conditioning, ceiling fan, 2 x sheds and a huge rear yard for the kids to play on a great sized 650m2 (approx.) allotment.
When it comes to buying a weekender, first home, investment property or downsizer, it doesnt come much better than this!! Priced to sell in a great location and only just a short walk to the whites beach, the flying fox park, Deep Creek Reserve, Tennis Courts and Loch Ard Drive convenience store.
Insights: 12 Scammell Crescent, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT VALUE !!! - Motivated Vendor
Encompassing open-plan living whilst featuring plenty of room for outdoor entertainment, this modern home is perfect for those searching for a quiet street setting and/or low maintenance investment.
Walking distance to the Waurn Ponds Train Station & located within a short trip to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, various schools and easy access to the Ring Road, the convenient location is not to be missed.
Internally comprising 4 generous bedrooms with the master bedroom offering full ensuite and walk in robe, the functional floorplan is sure to tick the boxes for many buyers.
The central kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances and overlooks the open plan living and dining which opens out to the undercover alfresco. The climate is controlled year round with reverse cycle air conditioning and gas ducted heating.
A generous backyard is surrounded with low-maintenance gardens. The double remote garage has rear and internal access and with nearly 5m from the side of the home to the western boundary, there is plenty of room for additional garaging with a second cross over for storing the caravan, trailer or weekend toys (STCA).
This is a solid home in a great location at an affordable price, so don't miss the opportunity and contact Dion Plumb on 0424 940 629 to learn more.
Insights: 6 Tannin Way, Waurn Ponds VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 25 other 4 bedroom house in Waurn Ponds have recently been sold.

Description:
Design Excellence in this Dennehy Built Home
The Feel:
Showcasing impressive features that include a raked ceiling in the main living area, wide gallery style entry hallway, modern kitchen & seamless indoor/outdoor living, it also has a north-facing, covered entertaining area with native gardens & Moonah trees. Offering 4 bedrooms with leafy aspects, the master bedroom has a WIR & en suite. An oversized DLUG & side gates for boat or caravan storage make this an unmissable Seabank home.
The Facts:
-Single level Dennehy family home with timber cladding & blockwork in popular Seabank Estate
-Clever floorplan provides zoned sleeping quarters, affording light & bright north living
-Open plan living & high ceilings offer great sense of space, with a large modern kitchen
-Stainless steel appliances include near new gas cooktop & electric oven, dishwasher
-Indoor/outdoor lifestyle prioritised, with sliding doors opening to merbau deck & café blinds
-Desirable north-facing rear yard provides a sun trap with lawn for children & pets to play
-Master bedroom enjoys morning sunshine, with a private en suite & spacious WIR
-Minor bedroom wing comprises 3 more comfortable bedrooms with ample BIRs
-Versatile floorplan has potential for a 2nd living, rumpus room or study
-Main family bathroom with shower, large bath, Tastic heater & separate toilet
-Split system heating/cooling in main living area + electric panel wall heater to bedroom hall
-Vehicles & additional trailers/equipment easily accommodated in DLUG, or via rear yard gates
-Outdoor Shower
-6.8Kw solar panels & 3,000ltr water tank plumbed to toilets & garden
-Situated within established estate, nearby to picturesque central parklands & moments to shops
-Well-equipped for families, a secure investment property or a holiday retreat - easy lock up & go!
The Owner Loves.
We love the north-facing backyard and deck, where we spend most of our time enjoying the sunshine whilst entertaining friends.

Description:
Appreciate the farm life! LAST LOT LEFT!!
Aussie farmers all have one thing in common, Space and outlook.
Grossman's Ridge is Bellbraes best estate as it offers both of these without the maintenance and work involved. Imagine looking out your north-facing home, with a beautiful sunset dropping down in the west and there is nothing but paddocks as your backdrop. Well, Lot 63 has just this. Vast views, north rear, all services such as sewer, electricity, NBN, gas to assist in making life even more relaxed.
Life wasn't meant to be hard!

Description:
Renovated & Ready to Go!
Ideally situated in a private and convenient Court location and set on a desirable 699m2 (approx), this charming family home is the ideal choice for the 1st home buyer or savvy investor. Close to local shops, sporting grounds, parks & schools and only a short drive to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin Uni, Epworth Hospital and Marshall train station, this is a great opportunity to secure a home in ever popular Grovedale.
From first glance this classic triple fronted brick home has beautiful established gardens, and long drive-way leading to a huge over-sized remote double garage. Lovingly updated and maintained, this home is ready to move into immediately. The light filled open plan design flows through from the spacious front living room to the dining, renovated kitchen with stainless appliances and walk-in pantry and second rear living with views out to the private rear garden.
The generous master bedroom offers plenty of natural light, while the second and third bedrooms both offer built-in robes. The updated bathroom features bath, shower, vanity and toilet. There is also a large walk-in linen press.
From the rear living room the decked alfresco area overlooks the large north facing rear yard which has established fruit trees and garden beds and is the perfect outdoor dining and BBQ area.
With additional features including polished timber floorboards, R/C AC, ceiling fans, Euro-laundry, second toilet/powder room, new guttering and quality fixtures throughout this is the perfect opportunity to break into the ever popular Grovedale market!
Insights: 15 Lewis Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Brilliant location on its own title.
Whether you are looking to enter the market, investing or downsizing then this property is sure to impress. This centrally positioned townhouse is close to Waurn Ponds shopping centre, library, aquatic centre, medical facilities, Christian College Junior School, Deakin University, The Epworth Hospital and public transport. On its own title with approximately 465m2 of land. There is a separate entry which leads to a spacious, open plan living and dining area. The kitchen is generous in size and offers an abundance of storage space, built in pantry, electric wall oven and gas cooktop. There are three bedrooms, the main with a walk-in robe, SS/AC unit and overhead fan, while the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms both have built in robes, with a centrally positioned family bathroom, separate W.C and laundry area complete the internal layout. The property also has gas heating, split system reverse cycle unit to combat the winter chill and summer heat. While outdoors there is a fully fenced front garden, private rear garden, covered pergola and double garage with auto door, internal access and rear roller door. This home represents excellent buying in a sought-after location.
Insights: 25 Broughton Drive, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2016 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern family home in quiet street
Positioned in a quiet street, this 4-bedroom rendered brick home provides a great opportunity for low-maintenance, comfortable living. With neutral tones throughout, and a flexible floor plan, this property is ready to move in and make your own. Conveniently located close to Leopold's Gateway Plaza, schools and green spaces, it also enjoys easy access to Geelong's CBD and the many attractions of the Bellarine Peninsula.
The master bedroom captures the morning sun and comes with ample WIR, ensuite and handy study nook. Bedrooms 2 and 3 offer built-in robes, with the 4th bedroom at the front of the house having the versatility to convert into a second living space or home office. The home's bright main bathroom has a bath, shower, vanity and separate WC.
Modern and functional, the open-plan kitchen features stainless steel appliances - Omega oven, cooktop and dishwasher - and plenty of storage. The stone island bench with breakfast bar overlooks the dining area, main living zone and out onto the undercover alfresco with hardy concrete flooring; an ideal space for entertaining in any weather. The laundry off to the side has under-sink storage and direct access to the clothesline. Outdoors, the backyard contains low maintenance garden beds with pittosporums creating a leafy privacy screen, and a sun-dappled area to enjoy a morning coffee. A thriving gum tree takes centre place in the front yard, as well as a manageable patch of lawn.
Added features include gas ducted heating throughout, split system A/C and double garage with internal access. For comfortable living in a relaxed area with easy access to Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula, arrange an inspection today!
- Spacious master bedroom with ensuite, ample WIR & study nook
- Modern open-plan living space with adjoining alfresco
- Gas ducted heating & split system AC provide climate control
- Double lock-up garage with internal access
- Quiet location near the Bellarine Rail Trail & green spaces
- Close to Gateway Plaza/schools, with easy access to Geelong
Insights: 10 Barberino Way, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Downsize with a yard!
If you're looking to downsize but not ready to give up a bit of yard space - here's the answer! Perfect for first home owners and investors also - and the rental market is amazing right now!
Set on a very flat 450m2 in a quiet street, this delightful 3 bedroom home has a clever floorplan with north-facing open plan kitchen/dining/living at the rear, and a two-way bathroom doubling as an ensuite to the master with WIR. Don't worry - the the toilet is separate - like it should be!
You'll love having a large laundry, a double garage to keep the car safe and being just minutes to everything.
Be quick - arrange your private inspection now!

Description:
SURFCOAST LIFESTYLE - 5 IRONBARK COURT, TORQUAY VICTORIA
Phone enquiry code for this property: 3229
Set in prestigious Ocean Acres Estate this Peaceful and Spacious Family Home is set on 4037m2 allotment offering the best of both worlds.
HIA Award winning Master built residence includes:
Five Bed Rooms.
Formal lounge.
Sitting room with fireplace.
Large open plan living and dining.
Well-appointed kitchen.
Full butlers pantry.
Rumpus room,
Two bathrooms.
Large Laundry with sewing/Study area.
3 WCs, BIRs throughout, WIRs to master and plentiful storage.
Solar Panels.
Double glazing.
Ducted gas heating.
Evaporative cooling.
Ducted vacuum and quality fittings and appliances.
A 9.5 x 5m solar heated in ground pool with waterfall and large shade sail adjoins the sensational high clearance matching pool house complete with mezzanine and full ensuite facilities. This magnificent Pool House is ideal as a teenagers retreat / games room./ or possible Bed and Breakfast.
Full size, fully fenced synthetic tennis court with practice wall.
Covered outdoor entertaining area.
2 car garage/workshop (front and back roller doors) plus double carport.
Garden shed.
3 x 20,000 litre water tanks.
Secure yard space plus raised garden beds.
Town water, town gas, power and NBN .
This magnificent property simply presents The ultimate in resort style living, close to schools and a 5 minute drive to Surfcoast beaches. If a sense of community and a connection to both coastal and country life are important, you will find them in abundance here.

Description:
Coastal Woodland Oasis
The Feel:
A home of unique character, this solid construction offers 4 large bedrooms & 2 living areas, leading to a rear deck with louvered Vergola roof & superb solar heated, salt chlorinated in-ground pool that basks in all-day sun. Underpinned by hardwood & slate floors, with the versatility of an upstairs home office, rumpus or bedroom, theres a wonderful light-filled ambience that resonates warmth & adds to the residence's distinctive charm. Extension possibilities exist for upstairs or on the large block (STCA).
The Facts:
-4 BR home on 669sqm approx. in highly sought-after pocket of Barwon Heads
-North frontage coastal woodland setting in desirable street with no-thru traffic
-Very private aspect, fully fenced with RC front gate & side gate access for trailer parking
-Rear deck with louvered Vergola roof & café blinds for comfortable year-round entertaining
-Magnificent solar heated, salt chlorinated in-ground pool w/ glass balustrade pool fence
-Hardwood & slate floors throughout, with 2 generous family living areas
-Kitchen with servery-style brekky bar, electric oven, DW & walk-in pantry
-Spacious open plan living & dining areas with cosy gas log burner, split system & ceiling fans
-Master with walk-in robe & en suite
-2 more carpeted bedrooms downstairs with stunning garden outlooks
-Unique opportunity upstairs for home office, rumpus or 4th bedroom
-Central bathroom with WC, shower, bath & vanity (additional 3rd WC to main living)
-DLUG w/ internal access via the walk-in pantry makes for easy unpacking from the car
-Remote controlled electric roller shutters to bedrooms & most living areas
-2 x 2500L water tanks support the pool & gardens
-Extension possibilities exist for upstairs or on the large 669sqm approx. block (STCA)
-Walk to the Village Park, beach, Barwon Heads Primary & Hitchcock Avenue
The Owner Loves.
We spend all of our time out on the deck overlooking the pool its a beautiful sunny position, & we love being surrounded by the iconic Moonah Trees.

Description:
Low maintenance living with alfresco
Hidden at the rear of the complex within a highly-sought after location, this unit is an absolute gem. Whether you're dreaming of breaking into the property market, searching for a savvy investment or even looking to downsize, this could be the one you're searching for!
On entry, a light-filled living area flows through to an open plan dining and kitchen area. The chef's head quarters feature a brand new electric oven, electric stove-top and ample storage. Two large bedrooms both have floor-to-ceiling built-in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet. Outside is the spacious and private decked alfresco area with plenty of entertaining options for all year round.
Additional features include electric heating, spacious laundry, single car lock up garage with internal access and a brand new hot water service.
Minutes to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, public transport, local schools, Deakin University and short drive to the Surf Coast.
Approx rental return - $320 p/w.
Inspection will not disappoint.
Insights: 3/10 Heyers Road, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 32 other 2 bedroom unit in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Versatile family home on 1,043sqm, with modernist flair.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam Foster on 0406 597 050.
Opportunities like this do not come along every day to secure a property in the elite area of Queens Park. Located on a fantastic 1043sqm (approx.) corner block, with dual access, this home is bound to appeal to many families looking for that extra space and style of a quality property in desired locale.
Comprising of four spacious bedrooms all with built-in robes and master with built in robes and ensuite, plus the self-sufficient unit/office space, perfect home office or guest room when the in-laws are coming down to stay! Central bathroom and separate toilet/vanity services the entire property. Fully equipped kitchen, gas stove/oven, dishwasher, built in/pull out pantry and a mammoth stone island bench. North facing open plan living and dining area is flooded with natural light and leads seamlessly out onto the outdoor entertaining balcony, soaking in outlooks across Fyansford and Queens Park.
Features include a 3KW solar panel system, gorgeous timber flooring throughout, ducted heating and cooling through the floor and the ability to accommodate up to five cars. Triple garage entry from Maidie Street and double carport for boats or trailers, entry from Scenic Road. With seamless access to the Barwon River, Buckley Falls and its walking tracks, Pakington Street, Barrabool Hills Plaza, St Joseph's and Geelong College, plus the added convenience of the Ring Road for commuters. All the hard work is done for you and is just waiting to be enjoyed.
Insights: 278 Scenic Road, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Admirable family living, riverside.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam Foster on 0406 597 050.
Offering extensive views towards the Barwon River and beyond, positioned perfectly amongst the quiet and leafy streets of North Highton, this property provides a sizeable 750m2 allotment within a pocket of Highton that is highly sought after and just as tightly held. Being so close to the Barwon River walking tracks and the Highton Village, this property offers unparalleled access to both Highton's first class amenities and the Geelong CBD.
Comprising a downstairs rumpus, lounge space and a large living/dining area, the property is more than equipped to cater for an everyday growing family. Bedrooms are all spacious in size, master with both ensuite and a walk in robe, remaining with built in robes and serviced by a separate bathroom and toilet, with the fourth bedrooms downstairs serviced with it's own bathroom and toilet, perfect for a teenagers treat or the in-laws staying for the weekend. The study also presents an option for a fifth bedroom upon entry. The kitchen features expansive space for the keen home cook, allowing seamless access out onto the north facing outdoor balcony, perfect for indoor/outdoor entertaining all year round.
The paved outdoor area is the perfect backdrop for an outdoor entertaining or dining setting and is complete with maintained and established gardens. Some other features the property include ducted heating, split system in kitchen, double garage and excellent under house storage space for workshop, cellar and a kitchenette.

Description:
Cheapest Home In Barwon Heads!
The Feel:
The location of this property alone will win over many buyers. Within walking distance to the bustling shops, cafes and iconic Barwon heads bridge, it ticks all the boxes for a family friendly holiday rental or low maintenance downsizer.
The Facts:
- An immaculate single-story dwelling on its own title in a supreme location to envy
- Situated safely back from the street, Barwon Heads Skate Park & fantastic Pirate Park just a short walk away
- Gorgeous sun-drenched lounge with wooden floors & high ceilings, large open plan kitchen with breakfast bar dining
- Timber flooring flows through the living zones and hall to the entrance, practical consideration for beach-side living
- Alfresco dining on the tiered decking, create your own private sanctuary for those long summer nights
- Framed by easy care coastal garden beds and high fences creating privacy
- Ducted vacuum, gas log heater and split system ensures comfort and easy cleaning throughout
- A family friendly bathroom with tiled shower services 2 bedrooms, each with floor to ceiling BIRs
- At the opposite end of the home a convenient second WC, adjacent to the laundry
- Drive into the SLUG
- Fenced decking area with option of expansion, ideal seclusion for the children to play safely or secure the dog
- Walk to Barwon Heads primary school, kindergarten, the bustling cafes & shops turn holiday living into a lifestyle
The Owners Loves....
'We love how close we are to everything. We hardly have to use our car!'

Description:
Lets Talk About Bang For Buck..
When it comes to location and value, this sensational home ticks box after box! A functional floorplan that fits the demands of modern living with the real clinch being flexibility and accessibility to all the necessities.
Offering a light and bright interior from front to back, the property balances privacy with open plan living perfectly. Zoned to the front the home is your sizable master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, the second bedroom, designated study and the sought after second living zone perfect for keeping the sanity of the household in check. The third bedroom is zoned toward the rear of the home and serviced by a central bathroom.
The heart of the home is the open plan kitchen, main living and dining area with a north-facing aspect for that exceptional natural light. With storage options aplenty, the warm communal space flows easily outdoors where the undercover alfresco allows for all year entertaining and the low maintenance yard will save you Sunday's of garden maintenance.
Further features:
- Ducted central heating/evaporative cooling.
- Split system air conditioning.
- Double remote lock up garage.
- A short stroll to public transport.

Description:
Hightons Most Exclusive Court
Measuring an enormous 889sqm (approx.) and positioned in riverfalls, Geelongs premier lifestyle estate with million dollar homes and million dollar views. Perfectly located upon the winding rivers of delightful Buckley Falls, this huge allotment offers the very best in prestigious and luxury lifestyle opportunities and is likely the best allotment you can find anywhere in Geelong or the Surfcoast. A wide and spacious court location which includes direct access to master planned parks and walking tracks along the Barwon River. Capturing sweeping uninterrupted views across the river and beyond. Tucked quietly away from the hustle and bustle but still retaining all of the conveniences you would expect of a prestigious development. Close proximity to the Geelong Ring Road positions you perfectly, one-hour drive to Melbourne CBD and 25 minutes to the Surfcoast. Dont miss out on this opportuniyty to build a future for your family at Riverfalls, where the lifestyle is Exceptional by Design

Description:
An Abundance of Natural Light in Charming Renovation
Sitting on a generous 675sqm allotment is this well-presented home which has been the recent recipient of a charming renovation throughout. With a copious amount of natural sunlight coming through to the open plan kitchen, living and dining from the North this home boasts the type of property that is often sought after but rarely found.
The loving renovation leaves nothing for the astute purchaser to do. Whether you're a first home buyer, investor or simply looking for your new home, this property gives the perfect opportunity to simply move in and enjoy the lifestyle the area has to offer.
Three generously proportioned bedrooms all with built-in robes
Open plan kitchen, living and dining with North facing sun
Kitchen features stone benchtop and stainless-steel appliances
Hardwood floorboards throughout, near new tiling to wet areas
Plenty of storage throughout, great sized laundry
Mature gardens to front and rear, spacious rear yard
Undercover carport and lock-up garage to rear

Description:
BEAUTIFUL, MODERN, SPACIOUS YOUR DREAM HOME AWAITS
This brand new, double storey quality family home situated in Quay 2 is beautiful, modern, spacious and with its strong street appeal will take your breath away.
Designed with a cohesive floor plan to ensure each living zone flows effortlessly to the next, the first floor contemporary open plan kitchen, meals, dining and grand family room exemplify this offering ample room for meal preparation, casual dining and entertaining in the one space that seamlessly flow out to the inviting decked alfresco area and gardens through bi-fold doors. A home theatre room on this level presents the perfect space for the family to relax and enjoy time together catching the latest movies while a separate dedicated study provides a place to work from home. The accommodation which comprises 4 large bedrooms with built in robes, master boasting ocean views, walk in robe and spacious en-suite are all situated on the second level as well as the family bathroom and massive games room.
This spectacular homes features are a plenty including ducted heating and cooling, ceiling fans, a 900mm cooktop and oven, stone bench tops to kitchen and bathrooms, walk in dry pantry, galley, soft closing draws, engineered timber floors, timber staircase, powder room, laundry chute and double lock up garage all this and more situated on a 448m2 (approx.) low maintenance allotment with fully landscaped gardens.
Do not miss the opportunity to purchase your dream home within a stones' throw to schools, parks, shopping, and easy access to the Surf Coast Highway, call today to book your inspection!!

Description:
Coastal lifestyle-Townhouse living.
** PLEASE CONTACT AGENT FOR A PRIVATE INSPECTION **
This delightful townhouse has a well laid-out floorplan highlighting 2 living areas, 3 bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs and down. A light filled open plan kitchen, dining & living area upstairs provides ocean views from the balcony while downstairs includes a spacious lounge and kitchenette to retreat to for family gatherings or quiet time.
The secure and private rear courtyard is an ideal entertaining space with ample room for entertaining family friends with BBQs on the weekend or a quiet area to sit back and relax under the sunshade.
Added features with the home include; European laundry, R/C air-conditioner, hardwood timber floors, remote roller door to garage with additional two car off street parking. Well suited to investors, holiday makers, professionals & families wanting a home away from home, a place to escape to or a permanent residence.
Located just minutes walk to Whites beach, Torquay Nth Shopping centre, local shops, schools and public transport. All that Torquay has to offer is at your doorstep.
We look forward to welcoming you home.

Description:
Key location - value plus! - OPEN CANCELLED
Absolutely perfect for the savvy first home buyer seeking maximum value where convenience is a must or the astute investor looking to tap into the consistent growth achieved in this pocket. Consisting of two generous bedrooms, light filled open plan kitchen, dining and lounge room with central bathroom. Features include gas heating, gas top cooking, private yard and single carport. Well positioned within easy distance to public transport, Highton Village, Waurn Ponds shopping, Aquatic Centre and the Ring Road. Major investment in the area including the ever expanding Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and Waurn Ponds train station underpins your investment. Don't miss your opportunity, enquire today.
